2.title: TeleRad

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph: Welcome to TeleRad, the leading Palestinian company in the field of remote radiology. At TeleRad, we strive to revolutionize radiology services in Palestine and the surrounding region by leveraging advanced technology to enhance the Palestinian medical environment, including patients, doctors, and medical centers. Our medical and technical team of experts and specialists provides remote radiology services quickly, accurately, and reliably.

teleradiology.title: Remote Radiology Reports
teleradiology.description: Accurate, professional, and reliable interpretation of medical images in a timely manner.

consultation.title: Consultation Services
consultation.description: Facilitating access to specialized and professional medical consultations from inside and outside Palestine, especially for difficult and sensitive cases.

secondOpinion.title: Second Opinion
secondOpinion.description: The second opinion service that enhances the confidence of the service seeker in the medical diagnosis and treatment plan.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.paragraph: The TeleRad team consists of a group of professional radiologists, IT specialists, legal advisors, and technical support staff, in a stimulating, positive, and flexible work environment. The team operates efficiently, with commitment and professionalism, to deliver services of the highest quality in the shortest time.

teamMembers.name: Dr. Ahmad Awda
teamMembers.title: Medical Partner
teamMembers.brief: Dr. Ahmad Awda is a specialist in diagnostic and interventional radiology with over ten years of experience. He graduated from Cairo University in Egypt and specialized at Rambam Hospital in Haifa. He has worked in several prestigious hospitals and medical centers and brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to TeleRad. He hopes that TeleRad will contribute to a technological revolution in radiology services in Palestine and the medical sector in general, providing high-quality medical diagnostics for everyone.

teamMembers.name: Mr. Ali Hamdallah
teamMembers.title: Executive Partner
teamMembers.brief: Ali Hamdallah is an expert in business development and project management with over 12 years of experience, holding a master’s degree in economics from Birzeit University. As the executive partner at TeleRad, Ali is responsible for the strategic direction and general management of the company, leveraging his operational expertise to ensure efficiency, quality, precision, and exceptional customer service. Ali hopes that TeleRad will offer an advanced, flexible, and inspiring business model.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are here to answer any questions you may have about our remote radiology services. Contact us, and we will respond as soon as possible.

Teleradiology Reporting.title: Remote Radiology Reports

Teleradiology Reporting.additionalInfo: We guarantee fast response times to support timely clinical decision-making.

Consultation Services.additionalInfo: Our expert team ensures high-quality medical opinions.
